text:
October 2, 1952
Hr# Burton Paula
RUOM, University of Minnesota
Kinncapolis, Minnesota
Tear Burtons
I talked with Si, Lick, and Allen concerning the
Executive Director’s spot and all of us are pretty much of
the opinion that Earl %nn is our best bet at this point#
(I tried to roach you but was told you were in New York#}
Prank is continuing to trace some references on him nd I
aia doing the sane thing* Dick Allen and Si are of the
opinion that we should call him in for a conference orior
to the convention in November# fide will be in Washington
on October 16th and will be available the evening of October
16th and the morning of the 17th for conference# He suggests
that we invite Wilbur to meet us. I have written the other
members of the committee and Wilbur requesting ‘chat they meet
me on the evening of the. 16th and the morning of the 17th in
Vtasnington, D# ^# and should HRs to nake the Ccu-b request of
you# If a majority of the group and Earl can be tliare at that
tame, I will conf.lri; the meeting aud make reservations fas:1 us
in some down town hotel#
Give me a reply by return mail#
Sincerely yours.
Graycbn Auspms, director
Radio Broadcasting Sei^vicos
lanager, WOQA(FK)
GAspe

out# Your schedule seems very heavy but Eushingtcn
